dexma.vendingMachine

Class VendingMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • dexma.vendingMachine.VendingMachine

  • public class VendingMachine
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines and provides interface to operate vending machine.
    Author:
    bhaskargautam

      • selectProduct

        public java.lang.Boolean selectProduct(int product_id)
                                throws VendingMachineException
        Allows to purchase a product. Verifies that Product is in stock and User has balance.
        Parameters:
        product_id - ID of the product selected
        Returns:
        Whether the purchase can proceed or not.
        Throws:
        VendingMachineException - INCORRECT_PRODUCT_ID INSUFFICIENT_AMOUNT PRODUCT_OUT_OF_STOCK

      • getBalance

        public java.util.ArrayList<Coin> getBalance()
                                     throws VendingMachineException
        Refunds the Balance Amount remaining in vending machine.
        Returns:
        List of Coins to be dispatched from the vending machine.
        Throws:
        VendingMachineException - COIN_OUT_OF_STOCK
